author: wn.com
title: Nick Mosby announces mayoral campaign to crowd in Reservoir Hill
text: Standing in the now-vacant complex dubbed "Murder Mall," City Councilman Nick J. Mosby billed himself in his official announcement for mayor Sunday as a transformer with new ideas and new energy. Mosby â€” who addressed a crowd of about 350 in Reservoir Hill's former Madison Park North Apartments... ...
